title: Standard deviation of maze time for 100 mice

content.description: The amount of time required for each of 100 mice to navigate through a maze was recorded. The histogram below shows the distribution of times, in seconds, for the 100 mice.
content.question: Which of the following values is closest to the standard deviation of the 100 times?

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
